## isArray() function

Patch for Array.isArray `isArray(arg: any): arg is any[];`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isArray<T>(arg: T): arg is Extract<any[], T> | Extract<[any], T> | (unknown extends T ? never : Extract<T, readonly any[]>);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  arg | T |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

arg is Extract&lt;any\[\], T&gt; \| Extract&lt;\[any\], T&gt; \| (unknown extends T ? never : Extract&lt;T, readonly any\[\]&gt;)

## Remarks

since it loses the type information of the array type solution by `laughinghan`
